availability.p: This text may be freely distributed, subject to the following restrictions:

list.item: You credit Perseus, as follows, whenever you use the document: Text provided by Perseus Digital Library, with funding from The Annenberg CPB/Project. Original version available for viewing and download at http://www.perseus.tufts.edu/hopper/.
You leave this availability statement intact.
You use it for non-commercial purposes only.
You offer Perseus any modifications you make.

change.item: Made Speakers lower case;tagged lacunae; cut L N="0006" L N="012" from line 328, '†L N="32" from 870; removed some caps;

$Log: eur.el_murray_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.7 2013-09-13 11:21:33 balmas01 reverting texts back to pre_cts_reorg tagged version
Revision 1.5 2012-02-14 18:12:30 ajones06 Standardized and in a few cases added in header info.
Revision 1.4 2011-09-07 13:57:46 rsingh04 adding rend=displayNum to lb tags
Revision 1.3 2011-03-30 17:16:22 gcrane small fixes
Revision 1.2 2011-01-13 03:38:25 gcrane more refinements making these files SDL compatible
Revision 1.1 2010-12-25 19:01:41 gcrane our existing files but with L tags converted to LB milestones --
Revision 1.1 2009/11/23 18:46:35 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 21:15:27 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:33:42 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.9 2004/04/21 20:27:27 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.8 2003/09/09 18:02:08 amahoney put spaces around em-dash entity so as not to confuse morphology stuff
Revision 1.7 2003/07/01 22:16:09 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.6 2000/03/04 20:34:32 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.5 2000/02/17 15:51:39 amahoney use n attribute on sp to carry over speaker names when long speeches are interrupted by card breaks -- and move card break past close tag of sp
Revision 1.4 1999/12/23 20:06:51 amahoney convert to P3

body.sp:
w)= nu\c me/laina, xruse/wn a)/strwn trofe/,
e)n h(=| to/d' a)/ggos tw=|d' e)fedreu=on ka/ra|
fe/rousa phga\s potami/as mete/rxomai —
ou) dh/ ti xrei/as e)s toso/nd' a)figme/nh,
a)ll' w(s u(/brin dei/cwmen *ai)gi/sqou qeoi=s —
go/ous t' a)fi/hm' ai)qe/r' e)s me/gan patri/.
h( ga\r panw/lhs *tundari/s, mh/thr e)mh/,
e)ce/bale/ m' oi)/kwn, xa/rita tiqeme/nh po/sei:
tekou=sa d' a)/llous pai=das *ai)gi/sqw| pa/ra
pa/rerg' *)ore/sthn ka)me\ poiei=tai do/mwn —

e)gw/ s' i)/son qeoi=sin h(gou=mai fi/lon:
e)n toi=s e)moi=s ga\r ou)k e)nu/brisas kakoi=s.
mega/lh de\ qnhtoi=s moi=ra sumfora=s kakh=s
i)atro\n eu(rei=n, w(s e)gw\ se\ lamba/nw.
dei= dh/ me ka)ke/leuston ei)s o(/son sqe/nw
mo/xqou 'pikoufi/zousan, w(s r(a=|on fe/rh|s,
sunekkomi/zein soi po/nous. a(/lis d' e)/xeis
ta)/cwqen e)/rga: ta)n do/mois d' h(ma=s xrew\n
e)ceutrepi/zein. ei)sio/nti d' e)rga/th|
qu/raqen h(du\ ta)/ndon eu(ri/skein kalw=s.

ei)/ toi dokei= soi, stei=xe: kai\ ga\r ou) pro/sw
phgai\ mela/qrwn tw=nd'. e)gw\ d' a(/m' h(me/ra|
bou=s ei)s a)rou/ras e)sbalw\n sperw= gu/as.
a)rgo\s ga\r ou)dei\s qeou\s e)/xwn a)na\ sto/ma
bi/on du/nait' a)\n culle/gein a)/neu po/nou.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.p:
*pula/dh, se\ ga\r dh\ prw=ton a)nqrw/pwn e)gw\
pisto\n nomi/zw kai\ fi/lon ce/non t' e)moi/:
mo/nos d' *)ore/sthn to/nd' e)qau/mazes fi/lwn,
pra/ssonq' a(\ pra/ssw dei/n' u(p' *ai)gi/sqou paqw/n,
o(/s mou kate/kta pate/ra — xh( panw/leqros
mh/thr. a)fi=gmai d' e)k qeou= musthri/wn
*)argei=on ou)=das ou)deno\s cuneido/tos,
fo/non foneu=si patro\s a)lla/cwn e)mou=.
nukto\s de\ th=sde pro\s ta/fon molw\n patro\s
da/krua/ t' e)/dwka kai\ ko/mhs a)phrca/mhn
pura=| t' e)pe/sfac' ai(=ma mhlei/ou fo/nou,
laqw\n tura/nnous oi(\ kratou=si th=sde gh=s.
kai\ teixe/wn me\n e)nto\s ou) bai/nw po/da,
duoi=n d' a(/millan cuntiqei\s a)fiko/mhn
pro\s te/rmonas gh=s th=sd', i(/n' e)kba/lw podi\
a)/llhn e)p' ai)=an, ei)/ me/ tis gnoi/h skopw=n,
zhtw=n t' a)delfh/n: fasi\ ga/r nin e)n ga/mois
zeuxqei=san oi)kei=n ou)de\ parqe/non me/nein:
w(s sugge/nwmai kai\ fo/nou cunerga/tin
labw\n ta/ g' ei)/sw teixe/wn safw=s ma/qw.
nu=n ou)=n — e(/ws ga\r leuko\n o)/mm' a)nai/retai —
e)/cw tri/bou tou=d' i)/xnos a)llacw/meqa.
h)\ ga/r tis a)roth\r h)/ tis oi)ke/tis gunh\
fanh/setai nw=|n, h(/ntin' i(storh/somen
ei) tou/sde nai/ei su/ggonos to/pous e)mh/.
a)ll' — ei)sorw= ga\r th/nde prospo/lon tina/,
phgai=on a)/xqos e)n kekarme/nw| ka/ra|
fe/rousan — e(zw/mesqa ka)kpuqw/meqa
dou/lhs gunaiko/s, h)/n ti decw/mesq' e)/pos
e)f' oi(=si, *pula/dh, th/nd' a)fi/gmeqa xqo/na.
